column1: Table 1. Mean annual (± sd) values of temperature (°C) and gross primary production (GPP, gC/m2/y), along with standing stock organic matter (OM, AFDM/m2), at the 22 NEON sites in this study. Values are averaged over multiple years for temperature and GPP using sensor readings from NEON. For OM, values are calculated directly from benthic samples.
